member.name: KERB_CERTIFICATE_HASHINFO
member.summary: The KERB_CERTIFICATE_HASHINFO structure provides the payload information of the certificate hash.

member.name: KERB_CERTIFICATE_HASHINFO.StoreNameLength
member.summary: Length, in bytes, of the WCHAR string specifying the certificate store name. If StoreNameLength is zero, the "MY" certificate store is implied; otherwise the WCHAR string must immediately follow the KERB_CERTIFICATE_HASHINFO structure in contiguous memory and must include a terminating null character.

member.name: KERB_CERTIFICATE_HASHINFO.HashLength
member.summary: Length, in bytes, of the certificate hash. The certificate hash data must follow the KERB_CERTIFICATE_HASHINFO structure and certificate store name (if present) in contiguous memory.
